allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "dir /b ""h:\Privacy\zapretgui\dist\Zapret\*.dll"" 2>nul || echo Папка dist\Zapret не найдена")

Bash(python -c "
import base64

# Новые токены
PROD_TOKEN = ''8355175571:AAHyU8ZWM36g-pUWWiezmzjth6AO7sKcKkE''
DEV_TOKEN = ''8449219940:AAGi8vuGDsk7NBqX10zDf-66ub-q1D6M6lo''

# XOR ключи
PROD_XOR = 0x4B
DEV_XOR = 0x5C

def encode_token(token, xor_key):
    xored = bytes(ord(c) ^ xor_key for c in token)
    return base64.b64encode(xored).decode()

def calc_checksum(token, n=10):
    return sum(ord(c) for c in token[:n])

print(''# PROD token'')
print(f''PROD_ENC = ""{encode_token(PROD_TOKEN, PROD_XOR)}""'')
print(f''PROD_XOR = 0x{PROD_XOR:02X}'')
print(f''PROD_SUM = {calc_checksum(PROD_TOKEN)}'')
print()
print(''# DEV token'')
print(f''DEV_ENC = ""{encode_token(DEV_TOKEN, DEV_XOR)}""'')
print(f''DEV_XOR = 0x{DEV_XOR:02X}'')
print(f''DEV_SUM = {calc_checksum(DEV_TOKEN)}'')

# Проверка
def decode_token(encoded, xor_key):
    decoded = base64.b64decode(encoded)
    return ''''.join(chr(b ^ xor_key) for b in decoded)

print()
print(''# Verification:'')
prod_enc = encode_token(PROD_TOKEN, PROD_XOR)
dev_enc = encode_token(DEV_TOKEN, DEV_XOR)
print(f''PROD decoded: {decode_token(prod_enc, PROD_XOR)}'')
print(f''DEV decoded: {decode_token(dev_enc, DEV_XOR)}'')
")
